feed.title: I do not support the BIP 148 UASF

entry.title: I do not support the BIP 148 UASF
entry.summary: In a post on the bitcoin-dev mailing list, praxeology_guy criticized the lack of specific alternatives being suggested in regards to Bitcoin Improvement Proposal (BIP) 148. He argued that this leaves the community in disarray. To address this issue, Tom Zander provided a list of clear alternatives on GitHub in the form of BIPs with numbers ranging from 0101-0108. Zander's blog and vlog were also shared for further information.
